org.deeplearning4j.spark.parameterserver.pw

Class SharedTrainingWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.spark.parameterserver.pw.SharedTrainingWrapper

  • public class SharedTrainingWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class maintains ParallelWrapper instance in Spark environment, and provides primitives for inter-executor communication during training over partitions.
